    • KeyStoreSignatureTokenConnection

      public KeyStoreSignatureTokenConnection(InputStream ksStream, String ksType, KeyStore.PasswordProtection password)
      Construct a KeyStoreSignatureTokenConnection object. Please note that the keystore password will also be used to retrieve the private key. For each keystore entry (identifiable by alias) the same private key password will be used. If you want to specify a separate private key password use the AbstractKeyStoreTokenConnection.getKey(String, PasswordProtection) method.
      Parameters:
      ksStream - the inputstream which contains the keystore
      ksType - the keystore type
      password - the keystore password
